name: expressionistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that uses, relates to, or is similar to expressionism (= a style of art, music, or writing, beginning in the 1900s, that tries to express people's feelings and emotions): The stage is lit expressionistically, with a palette that combines bright neons with dark shadows. The landscape is portrayed expressionistically and filmed with dramatic shadows and silhouettes. Related words
expressionism
expressionistic
More examplesFewer examplesA monstrous shadow loomed expressionistically on the wall behind him.The play has been staged expressionistically in several well-known productions.She used the sounds of the factory expressionistically, to reflect the changing mood of the story.The figures are expressionistically depicted with tense, angular faces.
